mapper.insert: insert ignore into success_record(product_id, user_phone) values(#{productId},#{userPhone})
mapper.select: select sr.product_id, sr.user_phone, sr.create_time, sr.state, p.product_id "product.product_id", p.name "product.name", p.number "product.number", p.start_time "product.start_time", p.end_time "product.end_time", p.create_time "product.create_time" from success_record sr inner join product p on sr.product_id = p.product_id where sr.product_id = #{productId} AND sr.user_phone = #{userPhone}
